scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma!
Hm? Miu? What are you doing out here?

It’s dangerous being out on your own. Let’s
go back and join the others.
Mmm... I still want some more time alone.

Well, I’m not about to leave you out here by
yourself.

*sigh* Takuma, why do you have to be such
a nuisance sometimes?

(Miu seems especially prickly today. Maybe
there’s a reason for it.)
Well, Miu, uh...
What should I say?
Do you not like us?
Because I worry.
To not lose anyone.
Is it that you don’t like being with us?
That’s not it at all!

Well, you always seem pretty upset with
Kaito.

That’s just normal. It’s not like I have
a problem with anybody else.
So why do you look so upset today?
That’s... That’s just what you think.

Look, don’t you ever want time to be alone?
You know what I mean, right?
It’s because I worry about you, that’s why.

I want to be there for you, be your strength,
make you smile. Is that so bad?
...Uh, what?

(...That came out sounding pretty corny for
some reason.)

(Miu seems like she’s at a loss for words,
probably because of that.)
Heh... Heheheh...!!!

Did you hear yourself just now? It sounded
like you wanted to ask me out!
Maybe for a date back in 1950! Ahahahaha!!!

No, hey, come on! You’re not taking this the
right way at all!

Oh, I see. Well, I suppose I should reward
you for your diligence.
Maybe I’ll accept your offer.
(Well, at least she’s back in a good mood.)
To not lose anyone.
So...does that mean you’re worried about me?
What? Of course I’m worried about you.
Though probably not as much as Kaito.

Kaito’s something else. Somehow, he’s more
than just too worried about me.
*sigh* Well, I guess I could go back now.

Besides, if I stay out any longer, Kaito will
probably come looking for me.

Oh, I don’t think he’s that much of
a worrier...
Miu! Hey, Miu!!!

I don’t believe it. He really is out looking
for you.
See? Heheh.
